title: game crashe in ranked
body:
the game crashed few times with me but it only crashes in ranked games
 when the game is fully loaded the game crash then it take me back to home page a moment later it tells me that i have 5 games in a lower priority qeueu
 i should be gold by now but i'm still stuck in silver 
 i wont play until riot remove the lower priority qeueu from my account..
 i cant take it any more one more and i delete lol.

replies.body: While we can't simply remove leaverbusters at request, this might be a good time to finally take a step back and troubleshoot your client for any issues before hopping back into a ranked match when this might happen again. Without knowing what errors you're seeing it's hard to be sure of what's going wrong, but let's start with running a repair through the client options first.
Riot can not remove your Leaverbusters. You must wait them out yourself.
